projectGridLines.description:
Description: Looking for individual with good management skills who can

Skill sets: MySQL, Python, Canva, Office Suite

Traits expectation: Good management skills, operations, Leadership

Expected learning: Through this internship, you'll gain hands-on experience in the fast-paced

world of e-commerce SaaS. Expect to develop proficiency in accounting and reconciliations

services. You'll also build soft skills like communication, collaboration, and problem-solving,

all within a supportive startup environment.

Specific courses required for project execution: ME F428, BIO F419
